attributes.action: Ensure that consumers are the 1st Priority of Banking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current economic crisis has proved that the consumer is the most critical part of any economic system and while the system was wrong to allow debt to run out of control, it must somehow reconcile this with the need for consumer spending - after all our economy is dominated by comsumptive value. The system should not allow banks to maintain fixed rates that exacerbate consumer weakness in a global downturn...after all their poor management is responsible for the crisis we're in...
